item.title: Animal Shelter API
item.description:
üêæ Animal Shelter API (CSC640 Project)

This project is a Dockerized PHP/MySQL API designed to manage animal shelter operations.
It supports user registration, login, animal management, and adoption requests.

üöÄ Features

  • User authentication with JWT
  • CRUD operations for animals
  • Adoption request submission & updates
  • Frontend interface for API interaction

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

  • Docker & Docker Compose
  • PHP backend
  • Nginx web server
  • MySQL database

Here is its documentation: Animal Shelter API Docs
